eventConfigurations.description: Map. The new event configuration values. You can use only these strings as keys: `THING_GROUP_HIERARCHY`, `THING_GROUP_MEMBERSHIP`, `THING_TYPE`, `THING_TYPE_ASSOCIATION`, `THING_GROUP`, `THING`, `POLICY`, `CA_CERTIFICATE`, `JOB_EXECUTION`, `CERTIFICATE`, `JOB`. Use boolean for values of mapping.
